text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
—— I'll see you for the next training session at 15:00 then. 
That's in 6 hours and 30 minutes.

I just finished morning training with Eishin Flash and was 
walking her to the academy for classes. On the way ——

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Hey, didya hear? Peeps are saying Best Crêpes is gonna be at the gates after classes end!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: For real!? That's like SSR level! We have to go!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …Best Crêpes…?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's a crêperie without an established location, only selling 
through a roaming food stall. It has been a popular topic 
among us horsegirls for the past six months already.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Apparently the crêpes are too delicious 
for words, and "just one bite will have you 
hearing fate's symphony".

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The proprietor is really whimsical, there are no set opening 
hours, nor do they announce over things like social media. 
Many have dubbed it a phantom store.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
If those girls are right, then this same Best Crêpes will be 
setting up at our academy after classes today…

I haven't seen Eishin Flash be this talkative before. 
She must be very interested in that crêpe stand.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I can not. Training stretches from 15:00 to 20:00, and I have 
not heard of Best Crêpes still being around that late.
choice_data_list: We can shift our training times.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……No, that's fine. A schedule set 
ahead of time must be respected.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That is the proper thing to do. 
…I will excuse myself here. Classes start in 14 minutes.

She always puts so much effort into maintaining her schedule. 
Nonetheless, I got the impression she felt a little sad about 
missing out as I watched her walk off.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Haah… haaah… Phew…

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Understood. Thank you for your time.

When our training after school ends, we usually have a light 
chat, reflecting back on the day. Just as I was about to talk 
to her, however ——

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I'll be going home early. Have a good evening.

She was gone in no time. I was reminded 
of how she had acted this morning.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …! Trainer.

I found her in front of the academy's gates, as I anticipated. 
There was no sign of any vehicle or crowds, though…
choice_data_list: Did you catch the crêpe stand?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Judging by the posts on social media, it left somewhere 
between 1 hour to 1 hour and 45 minutes ago.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Best Crêpes has been here three times now, 
but unfortunately none of those times have ever 
lined up with my schedule…
It seems I underestimated her interest in this crêpe stand. But since we can't predict when it will appear, one thing we can do is ——
choice_data_list: <size=36>Let's try to make your schedule more flexible.</size>

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
…I know you're suggesting this for my sake, 
but I really can't do that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It is not acceptable to change a perfected schedule 
for a simple case of curiosity.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Following the structured nature of a schedule is what 
helps me grow stronger. I… won't change that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
……Next time, I will try to pin down its opening hours 
before I create the schedule.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I will return to the dorms. I'm counting on 
you again tomorrow, at 06:00. Good evening.

Her stern and disciplined side is one of her positive assets. 
Nonetheless… this event left me feeling she didn't need to 
be so hard on herself all the time.
